trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA910_00805_SEQ_00<tab>Marcette would put you to work again, whether you like it or not.

TEXT_GAIUSA910_00805_SEQ_01<tab>The genius naturalist Marcette has deigned to appoint you to the most honorable position of Research Assistant Six, and promptly ordered you to procure a live lightning spark for her research. Weaken the creature and capture it in the receptacle she has provided for you.
TEXT_GAIUSA910_00805_SEQ_02<tab>You have captured a live lightning spark. Despite your concerns for the creature's fate, you have agreed to deliver it to Marcette.

TEXT_GAIUSA910_00805_SEQ_03<tab>Marcette is on the verge of another pioneering discovery. Despite your continued contributions to her research, she has yet to remember your number, let alone your name.
TEXT_GAIUSA910_00805_TODO_00<tab>Use the thick glass jar on a weakened lightning spark.
TEXT_GAIUSA910_00805_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the live lightning spark to Marcette.

TEXT_GAIUSA910_00805_MARCETTE_000_000<tab>Research Assistant Six. Yes, I am speaking to <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, Research Assistant Six─that is the title I have deigned to bestow upon you after your humble contribution to my latest scientific breakthrough.

TEXT_GAIUSA910_00805_MARCETTE_000_001<tab>Mind you, now that you are officially my slave─er, <var 1A 02 /var>research assistant<var 1A 01 /var>─there will be no slacking off. I require a live lightning spark. Here is a jar. Now hurry─I haven't all day!
TEXT_GAIUSA910_00805_MARCETTE_000_010<tab>The mere fact that you dare to interrupt me means that you must have the live lightning spark I require. Well, hand it over, then!

TEXT_GAIUSA910_00805_MARCETTE_000_020<tab>Oooh, aren't you a cute little one!? Just think of all the fun I can have with you! The next assistant who dares shirk <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> duties is in for quite a shock! Muahahaha!!!

TEXT_GAIUSA910_00805_MARCETTE_000_021<tab>Now, where was I? Ah, yes, toadstools! If my theories are correct, sending a shock through the toadstools will trigger a sense of danger, causing them to reproduce with unheard-of speed!

TEXT_GAIUSA910_00805_MARCETTE_000_022<tab>Truly, my genius knows no bounds! To think of the discoveries I could make if I had but a single competent assistant! ...You! Assistant Seven! Or was it Four!? Oh, who<var 1A 02 /var>ever<var 1A 01 /var> you are, begone from my sight and let me concentrate for once!
